channel.title: 60 Defence For D-Claws?
channel.description:
OK SO I JUST FOUND OUT ON MY NEW SOURCE A LEVEL REQUIREMENT OF 60 DEFENCE IS REQUIRED TO EQUIP DRAGON CLAWS..
SO MY QUESTION IS HOW TO CHANGE THAT INTO A REQUIREMENT OF 60 ATTACK INSTEAD OF DEFENCE
ANY HELP IS GREATLY APPRECIATED
-------------------------------------------EDIT-----------------------------------------
KK SO IVE DONE THAT MY ITEM ID FOR D-CLAWS IS "8002" I SEARCHED THAT AND DIDNT FIND ANYTHING
THE STAT REQUIREMENT IS "60" SEARCHED THAT VERY VIVIDLY DIDNT SEE ANYTHING RELATING TO "8002" OR DRAGON, OR EVEN DRAGON CLAWS :'(

item.title: 60 Defence For D-Claws?
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

Open up wearing and search for

	public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID)

Where you see something like

if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger")
Change it to

if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("Dragon claw")
Search for

	public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

You should see something like this

ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger")
Change that to

ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("Dragon claw")
Then compile and it should work
If it doesn’t then search for

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Void")) { return 42;
Under that add

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon claw")) { return 60;
Then search for

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune Kite Shield")) { return 40;
Under that add

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon claw")) { return 1;

Compile and there you go!

Read full topic

@kidzcoder wrote:

The easiest way to fix it is if you make the name d claws instead of dragon claws but if you want to do it where it says dragon claws read a tut about it:]

item.title: 60 Defence For D-Claws?
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

just search the item id for your d claws in client.java in your server files, until you find something relating to skills.then just change the skill number from defence to attack, save then compile. see what happens.

Read full topic
